item.title: Tick marks, variable names, and ggplot2
item.description: This tutorial identifies three common mistakes users make when attempting to map variables from dplyr::summarize() to aesthetic dimensions of a plot with ggplot2. It concludes by describing the solution to these common mistakes. Packages/styles To complete this tutorial, you will need to load the tidyverse set of packages and define a couple stylistic functions used throughout to make the #dataviz a little prettier. ## load tidyverse library(tidyverse) #> ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.
